Key Match Events: Heyliger took 2 wickets for 18 runs for Canada.
Amir took 2 wickets for 13 runs for Pakistan.
Usman Khan sealed the win with 15 balls to spare.
Rizwan reached his fifty with a score of 52* from 52 deliveries.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam expressed satisfaction with the win and emphasized the importance of taking early wickets.
Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar expressed disappointment and highlighted the challenge of facing high-caliber teams.
Pakistan's Mohammad Amir, who was named Player of the Match, discussed the importance of adapting to conditions and his clear role in the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's net run rate improved to 0.191, placing them third in Group A.
Pakistan now needs India to register a big win against the USA to improve their standing.
